name: Waivers
query:
SELECT name as 'Name:Link/Sales Invoice:200',creation as 'Date Created',reason_for_waiver as 'Waiver Reason',
modified_by as Biller,posting_time as `Posted Time`,customer as Customer,type as 'Payment Type' ,
patient_id as `Patient Id`,total as Total FROM erpnewsite.`tabSales Invoice` where remarks= "Waiver" 
AND `modified` >= %(from_date)s and `modified` <= %(to_date)s
